p: The structure and degree of ancestry in the 25 population samples were inferred using the Bayesian clustering analysis implemented in STRUCTURE V 2.3.2 under the admixture model and assuming independent allele frequencies. The “burn-in” phase was set to 500,000 iterations, then 1,000,000 Markov Chain Monte Carlo (MCMC) replications were considered. For each number of possible clusters ( K), 20 independent runs were repeated. The cluster ( K) interval was set between 1 and 25 (i.e. the number of considered populations).
